name: usergroups.users.update
desc: Update the list of users for a user group.

include_count.desc: Include the number of users in the user group.

team_id.desc: encoded team id where the user group exists, required if org token is used.

usergroup.desc: The encoded ID of the user group to update.

users.desc: A comma separated string of encoded user IDs that represent the entire list of users for the user group.

additional_channels.desc: A comma separated string of encoded channel IDs for which the User Group can custom add usergroup members too.

is_shared.desc: Boolean to identify if the API is getting called when a shared section is getting shared.

examples:
{
    "ok": true,
    "usergroup": {
        "id": "S0616NG6M",
        "team_id": "T060R4BHN",
        "is_usergroup": true,
        "name": "Marketing Team",
        "description": "Marketing gurus, PR experts and product advocates.",
        "handle": "marketing-team",
        "is_external": false,
        "date_create": 1447096577,
        "date_update": 1447102109,
        "date_delete": 0,
        "auto_type": null,
        "created_by": "U060R4BJ4",
        "updated_by": "U060R4BJ4",
        "deleted_by": null,
        "prefs": {
            "channels": [],
            "groups": []
        },
        "users": [
            "U060R4BJ4",
            "U060RNRCZ"
        ],
        "user_count": 1
    }
}
